description:
Flickr Addict Lite brings an almost unlimited number of great quality wallpapers to your phone. Wallpapers are rotated and downloaded automatically, with no effort required from you. 

Flickr Addict Lite is completely configurable, but also really easy to use. 
Users can simply get the best quality photos from Flickr each day, while power users can pick Flickr users, groups, tags and photo sets to download. 
Have complete control over what's downloaded, from searching through to blocking both individual photos and users. 
You'll never have to stare at a boring wallpaper again!
Flickr Addict Lite gives you the full functionality of Flickr Addict for a period of time, after which it reduces some of the features such as the number of photos you can download per day.

Also check out Flickr Mundo, which does everything Flickr Addict does with wallpapers, and much much more, including searching Flickr for photos, upload and download of photos, bulk editing of images ..... the list goes on!

---------------
v1.4.8 speeds up adding a users or groups photos for download as wallpapers
